article.title: DTRA Takes R&D Contract to TASC
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Defense Threat Reduction Agency (DTRA) has let a single-award, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to TASC Incorporated, Chantilly, Virginia,Â with a ceiling value of $600 million. Under terms of the five-year contract, TASC will provide advisory and assistance services to DTRA's Research and Development Enterprise, with a focus on new and mature nonproliferation technologies.
